title: Be clean and healthy
creator_credit: Langton Gould-Marks and Australian Instructional Films
brief_description: Contrasts healthy children at play with a boy who is “out of everything” because of ill health. Shows simple rules for the care of the body, including the hair and teeth, how to dress comfortably, what to eat, and how to care for eating utensils.
